document_data.name: Naneatha Lharilstar
document_data.mainbody: '''Naneatha Lharilstar''' was a [[Courtesan (prostitute)|courtesan]] at [[Piergeiron's Palace]], as well as the leader of the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] cell of the [[Red Sashes]], in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}. She was one of only two members of the Sashes who knew the true identity of [[Durnan|"the One"]].
document_data.Description: A noticeably beautiful woman, Naneatha had black hair, striking green eyes, and an olive complexion.
document_data.Possessions: [[File:CastleWaterdeep-HillockCourt-1372.png|thumb|right|270px|''Location of Naneatha's row house (labeled C45) ''circa'' 1372 DR.'']] She owned a three-story house literally in the shadow of [[Castle Waterdeep]], located on [[Gem Street]] and backing onto [[Hillock Court]] in the Castle Ward.
